## Plane class

Represens a plane by the equation ax + by + cz + d = 0

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Plane 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(a, b, c, d)](./decentraland-ecs.plane.(constructor).md) |  | Creates a Plane object according to the given floats a, b, c, d and the plane equation : ax + by + cz + d = 0 |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [d](./decentraland-ecs.plane.d.md) |  | <code>number</code> | d component of the plane |
|  [normal](./decentraland-ecs.plane.normal.md) |  | <code>Vector3</code> | Normal of the plane (a,b,c) |
